title: How to Get the Exclusive Mermaid Outfit in Roblox Dress to Impress

steps.title: Click on the purse icon on the left-hand side of the screen.
steps.content: Click on the purse icon on the left-hand side of the screen. It's the bottom icon of the three large circular icons on the left. It says "code" on the button, but it's a little hard to read.

steps.title: Enter the code "M3RM4ID".
steps.content: Enter the code "M3RM4ID". Enter M3RM4ID into the box where it says "Enter code here!" [1] X Research source Press Redeem once you've entered the code. You will get a notification on screen that you redeemed the mermaid set.

steps.title: Go into a dressing room.
steps.content: Go into a dressing room. The dressing rooms are across from the skin tone selectors. To enter a dressing room, approach it until you see a button that says E , then press E on your keyboard.

steps.title: Click the tab with the purse icon.
steps.content: Click the tab with the purse icon. It's the same purse icon that says "code" in the left-hand sidebar on the main DTI screen.

steps.title: Select the mermaid tail to put it on.
steps.content: Select the mermaid tail to put it on. You can also equip the mermaid scale top if you like, which is also redeemed when you use the code "M3RM4ID".

steps.title: Press Space to exit the dressing room.
steps.content: Press Space to exit the dressing room. To change the color of the mermaid tail, click on the icon of a person wearing a yellow hat on the right-hand side of the screen, then click on the mermaid tail. Choose one of the colors from the Wheel or Palette tab. The mermaid tail is not compatible with the Pattern tab or material selector.

steps.title: Get more clothes for free with these codes.
steps.content: Get more clothes for free with these codes. Did you know there are a ton of codes that give you more DTI clothes for free ? New codes get added periodically, but here are all the currently available codes for free stuff: 1CON1CF4TMA: Sweater and skirt outfit B3APL4YS_D0L1E: Doll accessory MEGANPLAYSBOOTS: Silver boots CH00P1E_1S_B4CK: Streetwear outfit set S3M_0W3N_Y4Y: Axe UMOYAE: Blue dress KREEK: Bear hat FASHION: Black and white dress LANA: White shorts, shirt, and legwarmers LANABOW: White bow BELALASLAY: Black jacket with pink halter top LANATUTU: White dress IBELLASLAY: Red, green, and blonde hairstyle TEKKYOOZ: White handbag M0T0PRINCESSWAV: Gold crown LABOOTS: Black boots ITSJUSTNICHOLAS: Black jacket ASHLEYBUNNI: Bunny slippers LEAHASHE: Sweatshirt and sweatpants KITTYUUHH: Black cat C4LLMEHH4LEY: Puffy dress and bear headband SUBM15CY: Necklace and eyelashes D1ORST4R: Bag and bow
